platform.summary: A national-scale cloud infrastructure for Swedish Academia
comments: The SNIC Science Cloud (SSC) is a community cloud and use of the resources is free of charge to Swedish PIs and their collaborators. As for other SNIC allocations you need an affiliation with a Swedish higher education institution to be eligible to apply for a project.
quotas: SNIC Science Cloud is currently a pilot project and not a production resource.
citations: [SNIC Science Cloud (SSC): A National-scale Cloud Infrastructure for Swedish Academia](https://doi.org/10.1109/eScience.2017.35), Salman Toor, Mathias Lindberg, Ingemar Fallman, Andreas Vallin, Olof Mohill, Pontus Freyhult, Linus Nilsson, Martin Agback, Lars Viklund, Henric Zazzi, Ola Spjuth, Marco Capuccini, Joakim Moller, Donal Murtagh, and Andreas Hellander. 2017 IEEE 13th International Conference on eScience, doi: 10.1109/eScience.2017.35
